report_title: Industry Research: Acai Bowl Shops in the US
executive_summary: Acai bowl shops have blossomed over the past five years due to numerous favorable factors. The health benefits of acai berries have spurred demand for acai bowls from health enthusiasts. Considered a superfood, acai berries have been welcomed by health-conscious customers, who place significant emphasis on their diet. Further, customers' ability to customize their bowls has boded well with the rising popularity of acai bowls over the past five years.

current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Acai bowls originated from Brazil and made their popular debut in the United States in the early 2000s. The dish, which is made up of acai berries, fruit, granola, nuts, seeds and milk or yogurt, is considered one of the fastest-growing healthy and superfruit dishes in the country.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The Rise of Acai Bowl as Healthy Food Spurs Revenue Growth
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As Americans have become increasingly health-conscious, acai bowls have become a new food trend. Acai bowls are rich in fibers, antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, proteins, and healthy fats, thus benefiting the brain, heart, and overall health. According to Hoodline, searches for "acai" have grown over the years, especially during the summertime.

The broader economic landscape was favorable for most of the past five years until COVID-19 hit the industry in 2020. In 2020 alone, the pandemic caused consumers to cut back on discretionary expenses, including on acai bowl stores. The industry has recovered as the pandemic subsides. Further, many customers become health-conscious and realize the benefits of consuming fruits for boosting their immunity, boosting industry demand.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: According to GrubHub's State of the Plate report, Acai bowls are ranked as the trendiest breakfast in 2020. Simultaneously, the popularity of acai bowls grew 359.0% compared with the previous year. Besides the health benefits, the "Instagrammable" look of acai bowls also supported its fame. The hashtag #acaibowl has more than 1.8 million posts on Instagram as of October 2021. As a result, new entrants are expected to continue entering the industry to capitalize on this trend.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Acai Bowl Shops Will Continue To Innovate
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Acai bowl shops will continue to add more flavors, toppings and bases to allow customers to fully customize their bowls. They will also expand their menu offerings to include a larger selection of smoothies, juices and poke bowls. These products also share health benefits like acai bowls, allowing they to cross-sell and generate more revenue.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Surging Fruit Prices Pushed Up Industry Revenue
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: In 2024, the industry experienced a spike in fruit prices, pushing up revenue significantly. Acai bowl shops have to raise their menu prices to accommodate the raise in input costs, raising industry revenue. However, as fruit prices are expected to fall, industry revenue will fall mildly over the next five years.

industry_definition: Operators in this industry sell acai bowls, which are smoothie bowls filled with granola, fruit and other toppings.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level: low - steady

opportunities: High Performance Drivers: Per capita disposable income

key_trends: The industry is highly fragmented because of low start-up costs, causing fierce competition between acai bowl shops.
There is a low differentiation point between acai bowl shops. Most shops compete vigorously on prices and locations.
Acai bowl shops endure competition from external sources. Budget-constraint customers might opt to make their acai bowls at home.

market_segmentation.segment: Customers in the two highest income quintile
market_segmentation.segment_description: Individuals who earn over $100,000 have relatively high disposable incomes and are time-poor, making them likely to purchase acai bowls. These customers also are health-conscious, increasing their demand for acai bowls.

market_segmentation.segment: Customers in the Lowest Income Quintile
market_segmentation.segment_description: Those in the lowest income segments often must sacrifice to afford acai bowls. Customers in this group will likely choose to make acai bowls at home, reducing demand for the industry.

Although middle-class consumers do not typically spend significantly on acai bowls, their demand is steady. These customers are also working individuals who are restricted on time to make their own acai bowls.

products_and_services.product_or_service: Acai Bowl Shops in the US
products_and_services.product_description: The provided content does not contain a description for this product/service.

Acai bowls are the industry's key products. Due to their rich antioxidant contents in acai berries, acai bowls are considered a superfood. Acai berries bases are then topped with nuts, fruits, granola and coconut flakes. Customers can fully customize their bowls according to their preferences.

Juices and smoothies are healthy, sharing the health benefits with acai bowls and allowing acai bowl shops to expand their product lines. By selling juices and smoothies, which use many ingredients that are also used in acai bowls, acai bowl shops can reduce operating costs by utilizing economies of scope.

Juices and smoothies are healthy, sharing the health benefits with acai bowls and allowing acai bowl shops to expand their product lines. By selling juices and smoothies, which use many ingredients that are also used in acai bowls, acai bowl shops can reduce operating costs by utilizing economies of scope.

To a lesser extent, many acai bowl shops also sell food such as poke bowls, salads, paninis and wraps. These foods are also considered appealing to health-conscious customers. By selling food, acai bowl shops provide extra convenience to their time-strapped customers. Acai bowl shops also sell coffee and cold brews to diversify their revenue streams.

demand_determinants.determinant_description: When income rises, individuals are more willing to splurge on food outside the home, such as on acai bowl shops. A rise in disposable income represents a potential opportunity for industry operators.

business_locations.location_description: The Southeast region accounts for the largest share of establishments at 30% but has a lower population share of 38%.
The West region accounts for 22% of establishments and 23% of the population.
The Mid-Atlantic region accounts for 15% of both establishments and population.
The Great Lakes region accounts for 14% of establishments and 15% of the population.
The Southwest region accounts for 7% of establishments but a higher 11% of the population.
The Plains region accounts for 6% of establishments and 7% of the population.
The New England region accounts for 4% of establishments and 5% of the population.
The Rocky Mountains region accounts for the smallest share at 2% of establishments and 3% of the population.

barriers_points.barrier_description: The industry is in a mature life cycle stage.
The industry assistance level is low and steady.

basis_points.basis_description: The industry is highly fragmented because of low start-up costs, causing fierce competition between acai bowl shops.
There is a low differentiation point between acai bowl shops. Most shops compete vigorously on prices and locations.
Acai bowl shops endure competition from external sources. Budget-constraint customers might opt to make their acai bowls at home.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: As profit is heavily influenced by input costs, a rise in the price of fruit over the past five years has weighed on industry profit.
Purchases, which mainly include fruit, acai berries, milk or yogurt and other ingredients. Over the past five years, purchase costs have increased due to hikes in the prices of fruit and milk.

volatility_points.volatility_description: Many shops have introduced electronic menus, through which customers scan a QR code to obtain the menu. Next, customers can order online to avoid wait time at the store.

volatility_points.volatility_title: Seasonal Factors Can Influence the Industry
volatility_points.volatility_description: Demand for acai bowls and related products the industry sells can be higher in warmer months and lower during colder months.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Many shops have introduced electronic menus, through which customers scan a QR code to obtain the menu. Next, customers can order online to avoid wait time at the store.

FAQs.question: What factors can influence revenue volatility in the acai bowl shop industry?
FAQs.answer: Moderate revenue volatility. Seasonal factors can influence the industry - demand for acai bowls and related products can be higher in warmer months and lower during colder months. Weather can also affect the supply of fresh fruit ingredients.

FAQs.question: How did customers adapt during the time period covered in the text?
FAQs.answer: Customers placed online orders for pick up or delivery, reducing revenue losses.

FAQs.question: What is the level of regulation in this industry?
What is the level of industry assistance?
